articles.title: Coronavirus immunity can last more than six months, study suggests - CNN
articles.description: Early research suggests immunity to the coronavirus that causes Covid-19 can last for at least six months -- and possibly much longer, perhaps even years, when all components of the body's immune memory are taken into consideration.
